snippet: Álvarez needed only one big right hand to defend his World Boxing Council middleweight title, turning a close fight into a smashing knockout in Las Vegas on Saturday night.
abstract: Saul Alvarez knocks out Amir Khan in sixth round to defend his World Boxing Council middleweight title at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas.
lead_paragraph: Álvarez needed only one big right hand to defend his World Boxing Council middleweight title, turning a close fight into a smashing knockout in Las Vegas on Saturday night.

headline.main: Saúl Álvarez Retains Title With a Knockout
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Boxing; Álvarez Retains Title With a Knockout
